description: Steep climb from Stewart creek up to summit. Rough going along connecting trail to back side of peat bog and easy downhill on gravel roads back down to Carmi road.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Go up Carmi Road to Beaverdell and just past cattle guard, turn left onto Stewart creek forestry service road.
title: Carmi Peat Bog Loop
